public static final class Values.BackedCachedMap<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
extends Values.CachedMap<BusinessObjectType,ParameterType,Values.CacheException>

Enables to cache in memory and on persistent cache a map of business objects.

2009.09.09
